com.team08storyapp

Class AnnotationController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.team08storyapp.AnnotationController

  • public class AnnotationController
extends java.lang.Object
    AnnotationController is a controller class that is responsible for resizing (if needed), saving annotations and update the current story and current story fragment.

    In current stage, AnnotationController only provides a public method:

    • savePhoto(Uri pickedUri)
    Since:
    2.0
    Version:
    2.0 December 3, 2013
    Author:
    Michele Paulichuk, Alice Wu, Ana Marcu, Jarrett Toll, Jiawei Shen

      Constructor of the AnnotationController takes in all the variables it needs and set them to corresponding variables to its own fields.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Bitmap savePhoto(Uri pickedUri, int mode)
      SavePhoto is the function where resizing, saving the illustration, and updating the current fragment are performed in order.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    • Constructor Detail

      • AnnotationController

        public AnnotationController(Activity activity,
                    Story currentStory,
                    StoryFragment currentStoryFragment,
                    int currentStoryFragmentIndex,
                    FileHelper fHelper,
                    ESHelper esHelper)
        Constructor of the AnnotationController takes in all the variables it needs and set them to corresponding variables to its own fields.
        Parameters:
        activity - an activity object
        context - a context object for writing files
        currentStory - currentStory, which will be updated after an image is added
        currentStoryFragment - the story fragment that needs to be updated
        currentStoryFragmentIndex - This is an index reference of the currentStoryFragment when updating. Since ArrayList.indexOf didn't work so well.
        fHelper - The FileHelper object that helps with saving images.
        esHelper - The ESHelper object that helps with uploading and saving images online.

    • Method Detail

      • savePhoto

        public Bitmap savePhoto(Uri pickedUri,
               int mode)
        SavePhoto is the function where resizing, saving the illustration, and updating the current fragment are performed in order.
        • resizing the annotation to 200 * 150 if it's larger than this dimension.
        • saving the image based on the information of its fragmentId storyId and current photo Id.
        • updating the story in local file system.
        Parameters:
        pickedUri - Uri reference to the image
        mode - An integer value to indicate whether the annotation should be also saved to downloaded story besides upload it to the online story
        Returns:
        Bitmap object that is decoded from the Uri
